page.title: 08Youth Entertainment
page.content: The most popular form of entertainment is Breakdancing.This is a very energetic,gymnastic form of dancing, where you use most of your body. Next in popularity is B.M.X.There is a B.M.X. track in Clevedon(in the Old Quarry).B.M.X. racing is where you race around a dirt track on a B.M.X. bike,jumping over ramps.B.M.X. freestyle,involves doing tricks on your bike.A good B.M.X. bike can easily cost over Â£100. As far as sport is concerned,football, rugby,cricket,hockey,badminton,squash, gymnastics are all popular.In fact,many young people like sportswear for their everyday clothes e.g.Tacchini,Nike,Hi-Tec. Computers are found in many Clevedon homes....Commodore 64,ZX Spectrum, B.B.C. Micro. (compiled by Clevedon Comprehensive School)
